Uses of Package
org.apache.taverna.server.master.factories

  • Packages that use org.apache.taverna.server.master.factories 
    Package Description
    org.apache.taverna.server.master
    The core of the implementation of Taverna Server, including the implementations of the SOAP and REST interfaces.
    org.apache.taverna.server.master.admin
    This package contains the RESTful administration interface to Taverna Server.
    org.apache.taverna.server.master.factories
    These interfaces define the principal way for the factories of worker classes to be invoked.
    org.apache.taverna.server.master.localworker
    Implementation of a Taverna Server back-end that works by forking off workflow executors on the local system.
    org.apache.taverna.server.master.worker
    A Taverna Server back-end that works by forking off workflow executors.
  • Classes in org.apache.taverna.server.master.factories used by org.apache.taverna.server.master 
    Class and Description
    ListenerFactory
    How to make event listeners of various types that are attached to a workflow instance.
    RunFactory
    How to construct a Taverna Server Workflow Run.
  • Classes in org.apache.taverna.server.master.factories used by org.apache.taverna.server.master.admin 
    Class and Description
    ConfigurableRunFactory
    Interface to run factories for the purpose of configuration.
  • Classes in org.apache.taverna.server.master.factories used by org.apache.taverna.server.master.factories 
    Class and Description
    RunFactory
    How to construct a Taverna Server Workflow Run.
  • Classes in org.apache.taverna.server.master.factories used by org.apache.taverna.server.master.localworker 
    Class and Description
    ConfigurableRunFactory
    Interface to run factories for the purpose of configuration.
    ListenerFactory
    How to make event listeners of various types that are attached to a workflow instance.
    RunFactory

  • Classes in org.apache.taverna.server.master.factories used by org.apache.taverna.server.master.worker
